tool.name: confluence_create_page
tool.description: Create a new page in Confluence. Supports markdown, plain text, or HTML content formats for AI-friendly page creation.

parameter.name: spaceKey
parameter.description: Space key like 'PROJ', 'IT', or 'MARKETING'. Either spaceKey or spaceId is required. Use confluence_search with type=space to find available spaces.

parameter.name: spaceId
parameter.description: Space ID (numeric). Either spaceKey or spaceId is required. If you know the space key, use that instead for easier usage.

parameter.name: title
parameter.description: Page title, e.g., 'Q3 Planning Meeting Notes', 'API Documentation', or 'Team Retrospective - Sprint 42'

parameter.name: content
parameter.description:
Page content. Supports markdown (# Headers, **bold**, *italic*, [links](url), etc.), plain text, or HTML. Example: '# Meeting Notes

## Attendees
* John
* Jane

## Action Items
1. Review budget
2. Update timeline'

parameter.name: contentFormat
parameter.description: Format of the content: 'markdown' (default), 'plain', 'html', or 'storage' (Confluence native format). Most AI agents should use 'markdown' for best results.

parameter.name: parentId
parameter.description: Parent page ID to create this page as a child. Leave empty to create at space root. Use confluence_search to find parent pages.

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: Page status: 'current' (published, default) or 'draft' (not published). Use 'draft' for pages that need review before publishing.

tool.name: confluence_update_page
tool.description: Update an existing Confluence page. Automatically handles version conflicts and supports multiple content formats for AI-friendly page updates.

parameter.name: pageId
parameter.description: Page ID to update. Use confluence_search or confluence_get_page to find the page ID.

parameter.name: title
parameter.description: New page title. Leave empty to keep the current title. Example: 'Updated Meeting Notes - Q4 Planning'

parameter.name: content
parameter.description:
New page content. Supports markdown (# Headers, **bold**, *italic*, [links](url), etc.), plain text, or HTML. Example: '# Updated Content

## Changes
* Item 1 completed
* Item 2 in progress'

parameter.name: contentFormat
parameter.description: Format of the content: 'markdown' (default), 'plain', 'html', or 'storage' (Confluence native format). Most AI agents should use 'markdown' for best results.

parameter.name: versionMessage
parameter.description: Optional message describing what changed in this update. Example: 'Added Q4 action items and updated attendee list'

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: Page status: 'current' (published) or 'draft'. Leave empty to keep the current status.
